There's a lot going on legally and he's preparing his speech for court, but apart from that I think he'll just want to spend some time with the family because they don't know how long it'll be after Wednesday. Some other U.S. organisations have bowed to government pressure to stop cooperating with the controversial site. Has Google looked at the appropriateness of indexing WikiLeaks? Going forward, we remain committed to aggressive investment in both our people and our products as we pursue an innovation agenda. Announcing financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2010. Google reported revenues of$ 7.29 billion for the quarter ended September 30, 2010, an increase of 23% compared to the third quarter of 2009
